jobDescription: Charter School District Testing Coordinator / Data Analyst position available.  Seeking candidates with 2+ years of experience in this capacity. Charter school serves 2500 students in two campuses.  This position is related to school data and services. The person  will need to have some knowledge of working in k-12 schools, STAAR Testing, school  assessments, etc...  Salary range is $55,000 - $60,000.  This is a year-round position. FOR IMMEDIATE CONSIDERATION, APPLY NOW! All qualified applicants will be responded to promptly.  >>> TeacherJobs is a Teacher Placement Office that helps educators secure new positions with public, charter and private schools. Our Staffing Specialists have over 30 years of experience and have placed thousands of teachers into new jobs. There is absolutely no charge to apply and have an informational interview with us. If you accept a job where we have helped you, a placement fee of 10%-12% of the first year's salary figure is payable for our services. Full details are in the online application that you may read before submitting. You may call us at (314)991-5855 or (972)514-3400 if you have any questions. We have the connections for our candidates to get interviews and GET HIRED!  Apply
